tool_description:
DEMO: https://goodmorningnews.xyz

Kickstart your day with Good Morning News on RapidAPI, your central hub for real-time Web 3.0 news and asset prices, capturing the essence of the crypto landscape.
name: Good Morning News
title: Good Morning News

api_list.name: SCRAPE
api_list.description: Fetch the latest news and prices from around the crypto ecosystem.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://good-morning-news.p.rapidapi.com/scrape"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "good-morning-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://good-morning-news.p.rapidapi.com/scrape"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "good-morning-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
